title: Velocity LF Players
body:
Team is currently looking for players that are diamond 2+ for a team that will get challenger and then go for OCS.
Must have ranked 5 experience and be willing to play more than 5 times a week.
This team will have schedules to for us to be on right times and make everything easier as well as sessions with our coach to improve play.
Currently looking for top and Mid.
Post bellow your IGN, role and what champions you play in preferred order to be considered for trials.

replies.body:
IGN: Cute Little Ahri
Lane: Mid
Champs: Leblanc, Lulu, Syndra, Xerath, Anivia

I have lots of time, and have placed P2 for season 6, almost P1.
